description.narrative: Effective support is provided to strengthen M&E skills and capacities to ensure high impact of the UNICEF programme in Brazil.

sector.narrative: Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in Brazil (Citizen engagement and participation)
"UNICEF Programmes in Brazil (Policies Monitoring and Cooperations)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Brazil 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Brazil Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Effective support is provided to strengthen M&E skills and capacities to ensure high impact of the UNICEF programme in Brazil.

description.narrative: Monitoring and Evaluation continued to be a key cross-cutting area in UNICEF Brazil and the M&E team worked across all BCO´s programme sections to support the knowledge management and promote organizational learning | Status:Met | As-of Date:22/12/2016

title.narrative: Number of strategic programme evaluations carried out by UNICEF, with an equity focus, and according to UNEG standards

actual.value:
2016:Achieved.
Youth Aware (Fique Sabendo Jovem) Evaluation has been concluded.
Evaluative monitoring process of PCU has been concluded.

title.narrative: Percentage of UNICEF products involving data reviewed by and with substantive contributions from the M&E team

actual.value:
2016:Achieved.
100% of knowledge products, publications, briefings and speeches produced by UNICEF Brazil have been reviewed by and received contributions from the M&E team.

title.narrative: M&E Team with adequate planning, implementation and learning.

actual.value:
2016:Achieved.
Three presential meetings held: team meetings during office retreats, M&E meeting in August.
All M&E team members went on external training, including one stretch assignment, two international conferences, several national events.

title.narrative: Rate of implementation of activities in the IMEP

actual.value:
2016:Achieved.
The rate of implementation as of this moment is 100% (completed or on track).

title.narrative: Quality of project proposals, logframes and M&E plans developed by UNICEF staff

baseline.value: good, but with no systematic support from the M&E team

actual.value:
2016:Achieved.
All PCAs and SSFAs approved by the PRC have been supported by the M&E team, both during preparation (M&E officers in the platforms) and during final review (M&E Chief and OIC). M&E officers in the platforms are involved in monitoring PCAs as needed.
